channel.title: Windows on Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Windows on Portfolio

item.title: Windows Deployment Service
item.description: I so far have not had the time or the knowledge to look into the Windows Deployment Services but it is something that i plan to look into over the next couple of months I will create documentation along the way that provides a clear and understandable guide on how to do it and what I messed up on so that you don’t make the same mistakes
